# Tapyrus ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰æ§‹ç¯‰ã¾ã¨ã‚

æ•£ã‚‰ã°ã£ãŸã®ã§ã¾ã¨ã‚
Tapyrus Core v0.5.1

# testnet

ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒãƒƒãƒˆã¸ã®æ¥ç¶šã«ã¤ã„ã¦

## Ubuntu

```bash
# create data dir
$ sudo mkdir /var/lib/tapyrus-testnet

# create tapyrus.conf
$ cat <<EOF >  /etc/tapyrus/tapyrus-testnet.conf
networkid=1939510133
txindex=1
server=1
rest=1
rpcuser=user
rpcpassword=pass
rpcbind=0.0.0.0
rpcallowip=127.0.0.1
addseeder=static-seed.tapyrus.dev.chaintope.com
fallbackfee=0.0002
EOF

# create genesis
$ cat <<EOF > /var/lib/tapyrus-testnet/genesis.1939510133

EOF

# start tapyrusd
$ tapyrusd -daemon -datadir=/var/lib/tapyrus-testnet -conf=/etc/tapyrus/tapyrus-testnet.conf

# ä½¿ã†ã¨ãã¯
$ tapyrus-cli -datadir=/var/lib/tapyrus-testnet -conf=/etc/tapyrus/tapyrus-testnet.conf getblockchaininfo

# ãƒ­ã‚°ã®è¿½ã„æ–¹
$ tail -f /var/lib/tapyrus-testnet/prod-1939510133/debug.log

# ---
# systemdã‚’è¨­å®šã™ã‚‹å ´åˆ
$ cat <<EOF > tapyrusd-testnet.service
[Unit]
Description=Tapyrus daemon (testnet)
After=network.target

[Service]
ExecStart=/usr/local/bin/tapyrusdã€€-datadir=/var/lib/tapyrus-testnet -conf=/etc/tapyrus/tapyrus-testnet.conf
User=user
Restart=on-failure

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

$ sudo mv tapyrusd-testnet.service /etc/systemd/system/tapyrusd-testnet.service
$ sudo systemctl daemon-reload
$ sudo systemctl enable tapyrusd-testnet
```

## Docker

```bash
# create tapyrus.conf
$ cat << EOF > tapyrus.conf
networkid=1939510133
txindex=1
server=1
rest=1
rpcuser=rpcuser
rpcpassword=rpcpassword
rpcbind=0.0.0.0
rpcallowip=127.0.0.1
addseeder=static-seed.tapyrus.dev.chaintope.com
fallbackfee=0.0002
EOF

# run docker
$ docker run -d --name 'tapyrus_node_testnet' -v $PWD/tapyrus.conf:/etc/tapyrus/tapyrus.conf -e GENESIS_BLOCK_WITH_SIG='' tapyrus/tapyrusd:v0.5.0

# ä½¿ã†ã¨ãã¯
$ docker exec tapyrus_node_testnet tapyrus-cli -conf=/etc/tapyrus/tapyrus.conf getblockchaininfo
```

ã‚‚ã—ãã¯ï¼š

`$HOME/.tapyrus` ã‚’ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã¨ã™ã‚‹å ´åˆã«ã¤ã„ã¦

```bash
# create tapyrus.conf
$ cat << EOF > tapyrus.conf
networkid=1939510133
txindex=1
server=1
rest=1
rpcuser=rpcuser
rpcpassword=rpcpassword
rpcbind=0.0.0.0
rpcallowip=127.0.0.1
addseeder=static-seed.tapyrus.dev.chaintope.com
fallbackfee=0.0002
EOF

# run docker
$ docker run -d --name 'tapyrus_node_testnet' -v $PWD/tapyrus.conf:/root/.tapyrus/tapyrus.conf -e CONF_DIR="/root/.tapyrus" -e DATA_DIR="/root/.tapyrus" -e GENESIS_BLOCK_WITH_SIG='' tapyrus/tapyrusd:v0.5.1

# ä½¿ã†ã¨ãã¯
$ docker exec tapyrus_node_testnet tapyrus-cli getblockchaininfo
```

ã¾ãŸ docker exec ã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãŒé•·ãã¦é¬±é™¶ã—ã„å ´åˆã¯ -it ã‚ªãƒ—ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã§ bash ã‚’ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒ©ã‚¯ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ–ã«æ“ä½œã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚‚ã§ãã‚‹ã€‚

```bash
$ docker exec -it tapyrus_node_testnet /bin/bash
root@ec5f4c4e49fb:/# tapyrus-cli getblockchaininfo
```

# dev mode

genesis ãƒ–ãƒ­ãƒƒã‚¯ã¯[tapyrus-core å†…ãƒ‰ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã®ç‰©](https://github.com/chaintope/tapyrus-core/blob/master/doc/docker_image.md#generate-genesis-block)ã‚’åˆ©ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ã¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

## Ubuntu

```bash
# create data dir
$ sudo mkdir /var/lib/tapyrus-dev

# create tapyrus.conf
$ cat <<EOF >  /etc/tapyrus/tapyrus-dev.conf
rpcuser=rpcuser
rpcpassword=rpcpassword
bind=0.0.0.0
rpcallowip=0.0.0.0/0
server=1
keypool=1
discover=0
dev=1
[dev]
port=12383
rpcport=12381
networkid=1905960821
EOF

# create genesis
$ cat <<EOF > /var/lib/tapyrus-dev/genesis.1905960821

EOF

# start tapyrusd
$ tapyrusd -daemon -datadir=/var/lib/tapyrus-dev -conf=/etc/tapyrus/tapyrus-dev.conf

# ä½¿ã†ã¨ãã¯
$ tapyrus-cli -datadir=/var/lib/tapyrus-dev -conf=/etc/tapyrus/tapyrus-dev.conf getblockchaininfo

# ãƒ­ã‚°ã®è¿½ã„æ–¹
$ tail -f /var/lib/tapyrus-dev/prod-1905960821/debug.log

# ---
# systemdã‚’è¨­å®šã™ã‚‹å ´åˆ
$ cat <<EOF > tapyrusd-dev.service
[Unit]
Description=Tapyrus daemon (dev)
After=network.target

[Service]
ExecStart=/usr/local/bin/tapyrusdã€€-datadir=/var/lib/tapyrus-dev -conf=/etc/tapyrus/tapyrus-dev.conf
User=user
Restart=on-failure

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

$ sudo mv tapyrusd-dev.service /etc/systemd/system/tapyrusd-dev.service
$ sudo systemctl daemon-reload
$ sudo systemctl enable tapyrusd-dev
```

## Docker

`$HOME/.tapyrus` ã‚’ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã¨ã™ã‚‹å ´åˆã«ã¤ã„ã¦

```bash
# create tapyrus.conf
$ cat << EOF > tapyrus.conf
rpcuser=rpcuser
rpcpassword=rpcpassword
bind=0.0.0.0
rpcallowip=0.0.0.0/0
server=1
keypool=1
discover=0
dev=1
[dev]
port=12383
rpcport=12381
networkid=1905960821
EOF

# run docker
$ docker run -d --name 'tapyrus_node_dev' -v $PWD/tapyrus.conf:/root/.tapyrus/tapyrus.conf -e CONF_DIR="/root/.tapyrus" -e DATA_DIR="/root/.tapyrus" -e GENESIS_BLOCK_WITH_SIG='' tapyrus/tapyrusd:v0.5.1

# ä½¿ã†ã¨ãã¯
$ docker exec tapyrus_node_dev tapyrus-cli getblockchaininfo
```
